mdBlocks.parent: Fletのアプリをより「**アプリっぽく**」することができるコントロール、**AppBar**についてご紹介します。
AppBarを使用すると、こんな感じの**画面の上部分に固定されたUI**をつくることができます。

![1000000556.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/8f1dbbd6-79d1-4068-aec7-474ac321d2e7/1000000556.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=3f8a80d52bc991ef9d3a7acfb0baa08f7e2798730962a45da674016d377c5192&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
インスタグラムのアプリで言う、この部分です。
Fletで実装すると、以下のような見た目になります。
![From : https://flet.dev/docs/controls/appbar/](https://flet.dev/img/docs/controls/app-bar/app-bar.gif)
AppBarは、パソコンアプリはもちろん、スマホアプリを作るときに役立ちます。
# AppBarの実装方法
AppBarの実装方法は、これまで使用していたコントロールと少し違います。
これまで使用していたコントロールは、任意の変数に代入した後、`page.add`で画面に追加していました。

```python
# これまでのコントロール
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# 任意の変数にコントロールを代入
		text = ft.Text(value="サンプル")

		# page.addする
    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
対する**AppBar**は、すでに名前が決まっている変数**`page.appbar`**に代入することで実装することができます。
{"icon":{"type":"emoji","emoji":"✏️"},"color":"gray_background","parent":"> ✏️ `page.appbar`は`page`の<u>メンバ変数</u>ですね。"}
また、この`page.appbar`は`page.add`する必要はありません。
以下のコードを見てみてください⇩

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
		# page.appbarにft.Appbarを代入
    **page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.APPLE),
        title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.MENU)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.GREEN
    )**

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
このコードを実行すると、以下のような結果になります。

![d7a1dbdf-822b-4608-a345-057581180b6f.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/854aa77d-e999-4ca8-b277-5ca4e90b78f6/d7a1dbdf-822b-4608-a345-057581180b6f.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=7460a225fc4e1d2210fd2ffb097629438b5b7f6cc29b6292dbdf247ec27f09b5&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
各部を設定するプロパティを示すと以下のようになります。

![ffb68a49-9792-4781-9d24-55d00d719022.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/cac638af-7f1b-4896-8e31-a5fa903a7f37/ffb68a49-9792-4781-9d24-55d00d719022.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=2be68ad8f3741f3b7de0a442e78bcc86ea10e2535f5a4a033cf969ae509c0563&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
# AppBarの役割
AppBarには、主に3つの役割があります。一つづつ順番に紹介していきますね。
## タイトルの表示
### `title`プロパティ
AppBarの`title`プロパティに`ft.Text`コントロールを渡すと、AppBarに好きな文字列を表示させることができます。
アプリの名前などを表示すると良いでしょう。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        **title=ft.Text(value="アプリ名"),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLACK12
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル")

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![0b9a27b4-6b11-463b-a93a-852bbbf668b8.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/ae95db3a-37fc-486e-9e70-675a32b6cb3b/0b9a27b4-6b11-463b-a93a-852bbbf668b8.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=367cd261b0b79420001a953fd2fe4e6d5b1d74bd332e9f5b89e17fa502320605&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
`title`プロパティに渡すのは`ft.Text`コントロールなので、サイズやフォント、色を好きにカスタマイズできます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    page.fonts = {
        "Jacquarda" : "/fonts/JacquardaBastarda9-Regular.ttf"
    }

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=**ft.Text(
            value="Applicarion Name",
            color=ft.colors.CYAN,
            size=35,
            font_family="Jacquarda"
        )**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![61b18d9c-cdd2-4459-8d1a-22e3ff246abd.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/e1bf9678-b68a-40b8-93d7-0b2a093f5e5b/61b18d9c-cdd2-4459-8d1a-22e3ff246abd.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=47d77310827f6358f6576e2f036edf136b54cc3bc772002adb2639b0db1d34a9&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
`ft.Text`コントロールの詳しい使用方法は、以下を参照してください。
[bookmark](https://flet.dev/docs/controls/text/)
### タイトルの中央寄せ
先ほどの例ではタイトルが左寄りになっていましたが、以下のように中央に寄せることもできます。

![center_title.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/e56d3a00-57e2-4016-9f36-425965a667e3/center_title.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=1583198fe539ad292b84a93cdca454fc87ce17acbf6249f31cefd830c2ef7b20&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
タイトルを中央に寄せるためには、`center_title`プロパティを`True`を設定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Applicarion Name"),
        # タイトルを中央寄せ
        **center_title=True**,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのタイトルのサンプル") 

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
## アイコンの表示
### `leading`プロパティ
このAppBarの左側には、そのアプリを象徴するアイコンを配置することができます。

![9b338a43-a54c-433a-adc8-7e3f6374712e.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/5b4e50fa-d3ad-4575-a089-a21e900514b3/9b338a43-a54c-433a-adc8-7e3f6374712e.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=371aa9c3540a74c75c1d4c99562299962c4e2f29f5749522fd1b65a099936479&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
この`leading`プロパティには、`ft.Icon`コントロールを設定することができます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
		    # 左端に配置するアイコン
        **leading=ft.Icon(ft.icons.TIPS_AND_UPDATES),**
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```
この`ft.Icon`コントロールで使用できるアイコンは、以下の[アイコンブラウザー](https://gallery.flet.dev/icons-browser/)で調べる事ができます。
[bookmark](https://gallery.flet.dev/icons-browser/)

{"icon":{"type":"emoji","emoji":"☝"},"color":"gray_background","parent":"> ☝ ちなみに…  
> 実は、`leading`に設定できるのは**アイコンだけではありません**。  
>   
> `leading`には様々なコントロール（おそらくほぼすべて）を設定でき、例えば画像やテキスト、任意のボタンを設置することもできます。  
>   
> コード例と実行例"}

children.parent: 実は、`leading`に設定できるのは**アイコンだけではありません**。
`leading`には様々なコントロール（おそらくほぼすべて）を設定でき、例えば画像やテキスト、任意のボタンを設置することもできます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        title=ft.Text(value="Horizon"),
        leading=ft.Container(
            content=ft.Image(
                src="/horizon_icon.png",
            ),
            padding=10
        ),
        toolbar_height=70,
        leading_width=70,
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarのアイコンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

mdBlocks.parent: ## 固定ボタンの設置
### `actions`プロパティ
AppBarの右側には、複数のボタンを設置することができます。インスタのAppBarでいうDMボタンですね。

![%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%81%AEAppBar.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/ba5956d1-8349-4a15-bf28-3820bc6a1bdc/%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%81%AEAppBar.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=60f7f1f1edbc0807c707c501ad3d8e2bf6666ede48597ce80ff0ee11a6f166c2&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
一般的には`ft.IconButton`コントロールを設置します。
このボタンは、**`antions`**プロパティにリスト形式で複数の`ft.IconButtons`を与えることで設定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    page.appbar = ft.AppBar(
        actions=[
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.MESSAGE),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.CALENDAR_MONTH),
            ft.IconButton(ft.icons.SETTINGS)
        ],
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_GREY_50
    )

    text = ft.Text(value="AppBarの固定ボタンのサンプル")  # valueを省略

    page.add(text)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![actions.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/81f429aa-2cb8-48ec-b7a7-78fff8764818/actions.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4665AW4QNMG%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T120516Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELz%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIAWCPi%2BvHl0v6JpcpERjT2DgGwlbsbPHvGIGsEOxYVy6AiAJiX3mWGSZTeoxpSZr0%2Frld6naWb001%2BA0mHaGcar26yr%2FAwgVEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMaoJiYtMrTbgyVz7eKtwDW1RWYwmagxUp8Y0UjpuAj%2Bh7mXALnLVaGOqQFKvnH7vr8NqCKJpUv38g%2F5YS0kmTtQhsIX14yDhUy19FFtrVet6gWEsXUN9RNPELhO%2FKq3prgrEcbFQKe9Pf4fxf898rXVHruS8AUZbtibMLVwU1M5GltXtP9NT%2BYS40pjqmjHVLZEjw%2BmCwvZrBefiQe1oHe%2FxTToeP32MWBo00A7cY7FGip6MGDcEn01aIDXvST4PuDiia5VihZFQJuzfzxioxubA4gdLZTeEDBkmpeHF7T9wCShtlkllEe758yozl4XcA6nPoaTK14pA8bUtB%2FRpLQnhkdNqUig71Z6ibfoW7gXN2aRmZNyCHafiX6g9X5CJ6Buh1OHha3oljQg6XK9hMI3xtz8jpQUYVx%2Fr6bGrYcUhT6u6WKaOal1rz8xCB2EKdmCRElmFjumLt8WJ3WMXGUqJnmqY2knh7tgvIeOTB82IFj1dX4Q2WD6PiIXQsCYoaWMFxILSg0Vsukxdzf%2BQK1%2B9VOvpG9P8xEtzeU%2BRqVNK8I%2BaM0dcEsEGT%2BfTb%2F8dsbxMf7oOy6QCbeNSMo4yChCuNoSbgIDJRpwfldce9QOfCm3c4mTzOyUwUfF4pFSNcV8XP1VJu%2FuNKw1Uwws%2FVvgY6pgHaN0IMAyQYuAmcl8fRc9utF6mbiq3COlkRwthddlmYpIOuGchyrN5P8ScLz9LXDdxu2N4iJVPPjUxl7Ws4qLm4%2BW%2FBwNc0xO8exotGskLX2CsfVB9ayfvAT01ya%2F1SVU%2BKPD%2F7tnFL4EV8ohtNnICzc%2BNH8aN5mEdDBIDB5MNobKK85YPFXTS9NrCZcRJ8b1FdVjwHstiVOuwITyhu2w2ogRBzKEUK&X-Amz-Signature=6600318a6187ca93996c46dfcadc9cffcfddca857a23c1a90ea690db9b5c30f4&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
専用の関数を作成し、ボタンにイベントハンドラを設定することで、特定の処理を呼び出したり他の画面に遷移することができるようになります。

childPages.title: ルーティング練習問題
カスタムコントロール
